description:
Nourish from root to petal

Our annual Flower Garden Plan is a crafted selection of naturally derived flower food and innovative soil amendment, designed to bring out the best in your blooms. Featuring our Flower & Rose Organic Garden Nutrients, rich in nutrients tailored for flowers, and WonderFert Soil Booster, to enhance soil quality.

sections.standard_annual_plan_highlights:
Targeted flower nutrition with 4-4-6 N-P-K (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) Flower & Rose Organic Garden Nutrients
Improved soil health with Organic Soil Booster, enriched with worm castings
Eco-conscious formulations for sustainable gardening
Made for all flower types , catering to diverse floral gardens
User-friendly , with a hose-end garden sprayer for easy application
Up to 200 sq. ft. coverage , perfect for flower beds and containers
sections.whats_included:
Flower & Rose Organic Garden Nutrients: Prevents excess leaf growth, promotes blooms
Sunday Organics Soil Booster Soil Amendment: Enhances soil health and nutrient uptake
sections.instructions:
Apply Flower & Rose Organic Garden Nutrients at the time of planting, following the instructions on the label.
Attach the hose-end sprayer to Soil Booster and connect it to the hose. Apply Soil Booster to prepared soil or existing garden beds, following the instructions on the label.
Reapply Soil Booster up to once per week and Flower & Bloom Plant Food Mix every 4-6 weeks throughout the growing season.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How do annual plans work?
Sunday’s Flower Garden Plan is a comprehensive kit in one simple shipment delivered annually.
Is this kit suitable for all types of flowers?
Yes, the Flower Kit is designed for a wide range of flowering plants. Check your flower type to ensure it requires fertilizer before application.
How often should I apply the Soil Boost and Flower & Rose Organic Garden Nutrients?
Apply the Flower & Rose Organic Garden Nutrients every 4-6 weeks. Use Soil Booster at least three times during the growing season, up to once per week for optimal growth and microbial benefits.
Are these products eco-friendly and safe for my garden?
Yes! Both the Flower & Rose Organic Garden Nutrients and Soil Booster are safe for edible plants and formulated with sustainable ingredients like seaweed and composted worm castings.
